content: We'll need to model medication dosing in ClinFhir for tutorial.
do give the dataType a good workout - as I was telling Melva, I've not checked that recently...
We're playing with it. It doesn't seem to support multiple dosageInstructions to be added and there are a number of attributes that aren't bound to the terminology.
Also, timing doesn't seem to be there

OK - will require some investigation (though I did think timing was there) - if you can give me a set of issues we can work on them before the next event. Would be really helpful if we can work on them well before the next COF though (testing is my weak spot) - you able to help out?
Hi David, I'll do some more playing for Dosage. I can definitely do some testing over the next couple of weeks.
That would be wonderful. It's so much easier when there's someone actively testing new stuff...
